title: Nova Scotia reports 15 new cases of COVID-19 Thursday, active cases drop to 147 - CTV News Atlantic
content:
HALIFAX -- 
Nova Scotia is reporting 15 new COVID-19 cases and 31 recoveries on Thursday, as the active number of cases in the province drops to 147.
